mapper.select: select VehicleinfoID, VehicleType, VehicleSeatsNumber, VehicleNumber, VehicleAffiliationCorpbasicinfo, VehicleaffiliationPersonal, Status, CreateDate, ModifyDate from vehicleinfo where VehicleinfoID = #{vehicleinfoid}

select VehicleinfoID, VehicleType, VehicleSeatsNumber, VehicleNumber, VehicleAffiliationCorpbasicinfo, VehicleaffiliationPersonal, Status, CreateDate, ModifyDate from vehicleinfo limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into vehicleinfo(VehicleType, VehicleSeatsNumber, VehicleNumber, VehicleAffiliationCorpbasicinfo, VehicleaffiliationPersonal, Status, CreateDate, ModifyDate) values (#{vehicletype}, #{vehicleseatsnumber}, #{vehiclenumber}, #{vehicleaffiliationcorpbasicinfo}, #{vehicleaffiliationpersonal}, #{status}, #{createdate}, #{modifydate})
mapper.update:
update vehicleinfo
VehicleType = #{vehicletype},
VehicleSeatsNumber = #{vehicleseatsnumber},
VehicleNumber = #{vehiclenumber},
VehicleAffiliationCorpbasicinfo = #{vehicleaffiliationcorpbasicinfo},
VehicleaffiliationPersonal = #{vehicleaffiliationpersonal},
Status = #{status},
CreateDate = #{createdate},
ModifyDate = #{modifydate},
where VehicleinfoID = #{vehicleinfoid}
mapper.select:
select VehicleinfoID as vehicleinfoid, VehicleType as vehicletype, VehicleSeatsNumber as vehicleseatsnumber, VehicleNumber as vehiclenumber, VehicleAffiliationCorpbasicinfo as vehicleaffiliationcorpbasicinfo, c.CorpName as corpname, VehicleaffiliationPersonal as vehicleaffiliationpersonal, e.name as name, v.Status as status, v.CreateDate as createdate, v.ModifyDate as modifydate from vehicleinfo v LEFT JOIN corpbasicinfo c on v.VehicleAffiliationCorpbasicinfo =c.CorpId LEFT JOIN employee e on v.VehicleaffiliationPersonal =e.EmployeeId
and VehicleType like concat('%',#{vehicletype},'%')
and VehicleSeatsNumber like concat('%',#{vehicleseatsnumber},'%')
and VehicleAffiliationCorpbasicinfo = #{vehicleaffiliationcorpbasicinfo}
order by v.Status, v.VehicleAffiliationCorpbasicinfo
